docs.text: Welcome to NTN Welcome to NTN Docs NTN is a fork of npm with new features for example NR File (NTN Requirements) Log Feature (Linux/MacOS only!) And others
docs.title: Welcome to NTN

docs.text: Welcome to NTN Docs NTN is a fork of npm with new features for example NR File (NTN Requirements) Log Feature (Linux/MacOS only!) And others
docs.title: Welcome to NTN

docs.text: Install For install NTN Use this commands Linux/MacOS git clone https://github.com/Thecode764/ntn cd ntn chmod +x ntn.sh sudo cp ntn.sh /usr/bin/ntn Windows git clone https://github.com/Thecode764/ntn cd ntn ./ntn.bat
docs.title: Install

docs.text: For install NTN Use this commands
docs.title: Install

docs.text: git clone https://github.com/Thecode764/ntn cd ntn chmod +x ntn.sh sudo cp ntn.sh /usr/bin/ntn
docs.title: Linux/MacOS

docs.text: Usage How to use ntn? Read the docs now! Help command By using help command, ntn shows a small tutorial for use ntn For linux/macos ntn --help For Windows ./ntn.bat --help Install command Use install command for Install packages from npm Use it like ntn --i package-name OR ntn --in package-name OR ntn --ins package-name OR ntn --inst package-name OR ntn --insta package-name OR ntn --instal package-name OR ntn --install package-name NR file NR file or NTN Requirements like python is a file for install packages NR File Syntax vue react Install package with nr file ntn --ri [file name] Uninstall command A command for uninstall packages Use it like ntn --uninstall [pack name]
docs.title: Usage
